title: African Ghost Short Stories (Gothic Fantasy)
author: Nuzo Onoh
Divine Che Neba
Chinelo Onwualu
summary: Following the hugely successful Black Sci-Fi Short Stories and Asian Ghost Short Stories, comes this deluxe edition of new African writing and tales rooted in ancient culture. This collection explores the deep-seated supernatural element in African storytelling whether reaching back to the spirits, ancestors and ogres of folklore or the vibrantly modern ghosts of today's African horror. New and contemporary stories complement poignant folktales such as from Nigeria.
